alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:59PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN CLERMONT...NORTHERN BROWN AND SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EST... At 458 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Bethel, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to vegetation. Locations impacted include... Mount Orab, Bethel, Williamsburg, Sardinia, Felicity, Hamersville, Mowrystown, Fayetteville, Chasetown, Danville in Highland County, Greenbush, Saltair, Buford, State Route 32 at US Route 68, Point Isabel, Feesburg, Fincastle, New Hope, State Route 136 at US Route 62, and Locust Ridge. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
